item.description:
Is it a bad sign when you start to plan your drinking? Haha! Well this one is not all about the drinking but about mingling and catching up with friends so I've set up  every third Wednesday of the month as Wet Wednesdays! - we don't want to get crazy!

Each month will be a new place so come with suggestions and recommendations for your favorite and convenient places.

Whether you drink beer, wine, cocktails or just water, like the little parched guy in the photo, come out to have a great time and enjoy some great company!

To make it fun tell us your favorite drink in your RSVP!

========================

WAIT LIST INFO:

If a member is first in line on the waiting list, they're moved into a spot automatically as soon as one opens up, and are notified by email.

The only exception is if the member on the Waiting List wants to bring guests: that member and their guests will be skipped over until enough spots open up at the same time for them all.

===========================

WAIT LIST & RSVP UPDATE:

One of the reasons I keep an RSVP limit is so that I can get a chance to meet everyone.  In the interest of trying new things I've removed the limit on RSVPs.  Please, though, remove yourself from the list if you can't attend - it will keep me from searching for folks and DO seek me out to say Hi!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the bar area.
item.name: Wet Wednesdays!
